thread.title: Karen Bretz

author: Karen Bretz
title: Karen Bretz
text:
I loved this! I could sign up and keep track of the exchange rate to make sure I knew when the best time to send money was (not only can you ask for daily rates but also get an alert when it goes above your requested limit). I knew exactly how much the recipient was going to get, at what rate and how much it was costing me - which was negligible compared to bank transfer rates - my bank wanted $50, I paid less than $10.
The only downside for me was that my bank account didn't automatically configure so I had to wait for two small deposits and to verify the amounts, which wasn't a huge deal as I wasn't in a great hurry and only added a day or two to the transfer, but it would be great if it could then remember my account as I had to repeat this process a few days later when I wanted to transfer again. But...no big deal in the scheme of things.
I would definitely recommend TransferWise for sending any amount of money and will definitely be using them again and again and again!
